title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Salzburg Global Seminar in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: I saw the posting on Idealist.org, applied online and was contacted within a few days by email. I was called in for a in-person interview with three employees, including a director. The interview was really straight forward, basic interview questions and other more specific questions pertaining to the organization's objectives and activities. The interviewers were helpful throughout the meeting.
Interview Questions: If your direct supervisor and a senior executive/CEO give you two conflicting assignments, how would you proceed?
